subject: Hockey, Ice
Concussions
Stanley Cup
lead_paragraph: Simon Gagne, who briefly considered retirement after sustaining a concussion in December and missing the rest of the regular season, has been cleared to play in the Stanley Cup finals against the Devils.
snippet: Simon Gagne, who briefly considered retirement after sustaining a concussion in December and missing the rest of the regular season, has been cleared to play in the Stanley Cup finals against the Devils.
